title: TASK_HISTORY View (Account Usage): Change to Status for Failed and Auto-suspended Tasks | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2023_01 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.

The Account Usage TASK_HISTORY view has changed as follows when examining a
task that has been auto-suspended by hitting its SUSPEND_TASK_AFTER_NUM_FAILURES limit:
The task displayed the state FAILED.
The task displays the state FAILED_AND_AUTO_SUSPENDED.
